game.name: Star Soraight Fantasy: Magic to reach the sky
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Tokino Sora zaps into another world mid-live! Join her Hololive friends in a thrilling Metroidvania-style action-adventure, blending 2D and 3D. Explore a mysterious realm, recover scattered items, and guide Sora’s epic tale to a dazzling finale!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tokino Sora zaps into another world mid-live! Join her Hololive friends in a thrilling Metroidvania-style action-adventure, blending 2D and 3D. Explore a mysterious realm, recover scattered items, and guide Sora’s epic tale to a dazzling finale!

reviewHighlights.text: Plays very well on the Steam Deck with no tweaking or setting changes needed. Fantastic game if you're Sora-pilled. OK game if you're looking for a sh...
